trans-unit.source: Push notifications to users (Android ) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Push notifications to users (Android ) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Mobile Services to push notifications to users of your Android app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Mobile Services to push notifications to users of your Android app.

trans-unit.source: Instead, please follow the updated guidance in these tutorials:
trans-unit.target: Instead, please follow the updated guidance in these tutorials:

trans-unit.source:
Add push notifications to your Mobile Services app
Update your TodoList mobile service to use Azure Notification Hubs to send notifications to users of the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target:
Add push notifications to your Mobile Services app
Update your TodoList mobile service to use Azure Notification Hubs to send notifications to users of the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source:
Send push notifications to authenticated users
Extends the previous tutorial to only allow signed-in users to register for notifications.
trans-unit.target:
Send push notifications to authenticated users
Extends the previous tutorial to only allow signed-in users to register for notifications.
